syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  // required by neovim extension for better performance
  "extensions.experimental.affinity": {
    "asvetliakov.vscode-neovim": 1
  },
  // required to honour the remapped escape key (in sway) to caps-lock
  "keyboard.dispatch": "keyCode",
  "window.confirmSaveUntitledWorkspace": false,
  "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
  "editor.fontFamily": "Hack Nerd Font Mono",
  // "editor.fontFamily": "JetBrains Mono",
  "editor.inlineSuggest.fontFamily": "'Monaspace Krypton', monospace",
  "java.trace.server": "verbose",
  // "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  // "editor.fontVariations": false,
  "editor.cursorSurroundingLines": 5,
  "editor.cursorSurroundingLinesStyle": "all",
  "editor.lineHeight": 1.7,
  // hover on text in editor, ctrl + shift + p , then Inspect Editor Tokens and Scopes to see its token name.
  // Then provide color for that token name below
  // "workbench.colorTheme": "Darcula (IntelliJ)",
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "menu.background": "#232121",
    "editor.background": "#292828",
    "sideBar.background": "#2a2828",
    "titleBar.activeBackground": "#1a1a1a",
    "activityBar.background": "#1a1a1a",
    "panel.background": "#272626",
    "tab.activeBackground": "#1e1e1e",
    "tab.inactiveBackground": "#141414",
    "list.focusOutline": "#569CD6"
  },
  "editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled": true,
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": false,
  "editor.bracketPairColorization.enabled": false,
  "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "always",
  "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.stickyScroll.enabled": false,
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "git.blame.editorDecoration.enabled": false,
  "git.blame.statusBarItem.enabled": false,
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": false,
    "plaintext": false,
    "markdown": false,
    "scminput": false
  },
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "java.sources.organizeImports.staticStarThreshold": 110,
  "java.sources.organizeImports.starThreshold": 110,
  "java.completion.favoriteStaticMembers": [
    "org.junit.Assert.*",
    "org.junit.Assume.*",
    "org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*",
    "org.junit.jupiter.api.Assumptions.*",
    "org.junit.jupiter.api.DynamicContainer.*",
    "org.junit.jupiter.api.DynamicTest.*",
    "org.mockito.Mockito.*",
    "org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers.*",
    "org.mockito.Answers.*"
  ],
  "[Java]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "josevseb.google-java-format-for-vs-code"
  },
  "chat.viewSessions.orientation": "stacked",
  "gitlens.ai.model": "vscode",
  "gitlens.ai.vscode.model": "copilot:gpt-4.1",
  // "editor.guides.bracketPairs": false,
  // "editor.guides.bracketPairsHorizontal": false,
  // "editor.guides.indentation": false,
  // --- Performance Improvements ---
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "search.searchOnType": false,
  "editor.codeLens": false,
  "gitlens.currentLine.enabled": false,
  "zenMode.centerLayout": false,
  "zenMode.fullScreen": false,
  "zenMode.hideLineNumbers": false,
  "window.openFoldersInNewWindow": "on",
  "theme-by-language.themes": {
    "*": "Darcula",
    "java": "Darcula (IntelliJ)",
    "xml": "Darcula (IntelliJ)"
  },
  "remote.autoForwardPortsSource": "hybrid"
}"}
